passage_text: Directions. 1  Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. rinse the turkey legs and pat dry. 2  Stand the turkey legs upright (as if turkey were standing). 3  Roast uncovered for 1 1/2 to 2 hours, until legs are golden brown and the internal temperature is 180 degrees F when taken with a meat thermometer.

1 Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C). 2  Rinse the turkey legs and pat dry. 3  Stand the turkey legs upright (as if the turkey were standing). 4  Press a knife downward into the deep tissue, creating 2 or 3 long pockets. 5  Press a piece of celery into each opening.
